name: Paneer Butter Masala
description: Creamy tomato gravy with paneer, buttery and flavorful curry.

name: Chole Bhature
description: Spicy chickpeas served with fluffy deep-fried bread, a classic.

name: Aloo Paratha
description: Stuffed flatbread with spiced potatoes, served with yogurt and pickle.

name: Palak Paneer
description: Paneer in creamy spinach gravy, mild, aromatic, and flavorful dish.

name: Vegetable Biryani
description: Fragrant rice dish with mixed vegetables and rich aromatic spices.

name: Masoor Dal Tadka
description: Red lentils cooked with onions, garlic, and tempered with ghee.

name: Baingan Bharta
description: Smoked eggplant mashed and cooked with tomatoes and spices.

name: Dhokla
description: Steamed savory cake made from rice and chickpea flour, spongy.

name: Rajma Chawal
description: Kidney beans cooked in a tomato gravy, served with rice.

name: Malai Kofta
